title: Classroom crisis: dealing with violence in school (TEFC)
creator_credit: Bruce Johnson, Dave Bell Associates and Dave Bell
brief_description: Violence presents a real danger for teachers. Dr. Fred Feitler of Youngstown State University has developed strategies for dealing with student fights, physical assaults, disciplinary confrontations and other crisis situations.
